DOC.brief_summary: Thiazoledinediones decrease blood glucose by their insulin-sensitizing properties. Here the investigators examined whether pioglitazone (PIO) improves insulin sensitivity independently of glycemic control and whether adipokines or non-esterfied fatty acids (NEFA) serve as mediators.
DOC.brief_title: Phielix et al.: Hepatic Fat Content and Adipokines
